attributes.title: I just can’t
attributes.review: I downloaded the app because yessss I want an orange man running as president... but then the app literally hacked into all my info used it against me now I’m just curious what I gotta do... so I leave bad review

attributes.title: ✨disgusting✨
attributes.review: downloading this app was a MISTAKE. wish it never happened 😣!! it’s scary and gross 🤢 i was a little surprised that it wasn’t orange to match the ✨wonderful✨ pig who ran this country but anyways 🍊⭐️💕😗👁🦖🤢😣🥺😠😈⭐️💔🥰💜🤩💗😍❤️🥺✨😞💗 highly recommendable NOT getting this app 💘

attributes.title: Killed my dog
attributes.review: After downloading this app, trump himself showed up at my house and killed my dog for being “not American enough”. He punted my dog across the road like a football. Will not be using this app AGAIN!!

attributes.title: crashing
attributes.review: This is the worst app i have ever gotten! it kept crashing and the information on it is never up to date!!!

attributes.title: This app broke my phone
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it made my phone glitch until it wouldn’t turn on anymore. Terrible. 1 star

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately received 307 text messages in Chinese and 8 in Russian , I think they’ve hacked me because of this app. Also many many pictures of hitler. DONT DOWLOAD

attributes.title: oh my god
attributes.review: so this app first off took like a month to download it was absolutely ridiculous. second when you open the app for the first time the ugliest picture ever pops up. i cried. im gonna need therapy because of that. but really donnie get tf out of office i dont even think you want it anymore. the only thing we can do to make america great “again” is voting you out of office.

attributes.title: WORST EVER
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever used. It lags so much and it downloaded Russian spy software onto my phone. Now I can’t access any of my photos or files without a password that I have no access to. DONT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU WANT TO HAVE YOUR INFO AND PICTURES LEAKED!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: app kept crashing
attributes.review: I got this to keep up with our great president, but the app kept shutting down and now I don’t have any updates about his campaign. terrible

attributes.title: Ridiculously bad
attributes.review: do NOT download, Is wanted to see our president in action but instead he was only asking for FINANCIAL AID. I mean he’s already richer than me so why is he asking for hand outs? Seems like communist propaganda to me 👎👎👎👎
